Message:
I get that a messenger sent
from the enemy’s side
would set people on edge...
But why’d I get captured
just for delivering a message?!

Everyone’s bowing to that girl
with the wolf ears and tail...
Is she the kid of some
bigwig around here?

“I am a messenger
sent from the city...!
I was told to retrieve
a ‘star’ from your tribe...”

Wh-Why’s everybody
whispering to each other?
What does “star” even mean?!

In other words, they want her?
Wait, why?

“Oh, come now!
If it was the chief of your tribe
I’d understand, but a kid—”
